syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  "editor.fontFamily": "FiraCode Nerd Font Mono",
  "editor.fontSize": 21,
  "editor.fontLigatures": false,
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Gruvbox Material Dark",
  "gruvboxMaterial.darkContrast": "medium",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
  "workbench.activityBar.location": "hidden",
  "workbench.statusBar.visible": true,
  "vscode-neovim.neovimInitVimPaths": {
    "linux": "~/.config/nvim/init_vscode.lua"
  },
  "extensions.experimental.affinity": {
    "asvetliakov.vscode-neovim": 1
  },
  "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
  "editor.snippetSuggestions": "top",
  "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
  "editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "smart",
  "editor.quickSuggestions": {
    "other": true,
    "comments": false,
    "strings": false
  },
  "editor.suggest.showSnippets": true,
  "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
  "vscode-neovim.ctrlKeysForNormalMode": [ "a", "b", "d", "e", "f", "h", "i", "j", "k", "l", "m", "o", "t", "u", "v", "w", "x", "y", "/", "]" ],
  "vscode-neovim.ctrlKeysForInsertMode": [ "a", "d", "h", "j", "m", "o", "t", "u", "w" ],
  "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
  "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,

"eslint.enable": true,
"eslint.validate": [
  "javascript",
  "javascriptreact",
  "html"
],

  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.fixAll.eslint": "explicit"
  },
"files.trimTrailingWhitespace": true,

"eslint.useFlatConfig": true,
"eslint.options": {
  "overrideConfigFile": "/home/za/eslint.config.cjs"
},
"window.titleBarStyle": "native",

"editor.showFoldingControls": "always",
"editor.folding": true,
"editor.foldingStrategy": "auto",

"window.title": "${dirty}${activeEditorShort}${separator}${rootName}",

"local-history.enabled": 1,
"local-history.path": "/home/za/.vscode-local-history",
"local-history.useWorkspacePath": false,
"local-history.maxFileEntries": 50,
"local-history.maxFileSize": 1024,
"local-history.daysToKeep": 7,
"local-history.saveDelay": 0

}"}
